title: 04/06/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/06/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the guys recap a news-filled Monday, from Sam Darnold getting traded to Baylor cutting down the nets last night. ESPN College basketball analyst Jay Bilas joined the show in the first hour to recap the rather convincing win by Baylor in the national title game as well as how image and likeness will shape college athletics in the near future. On the gridiron, Chris Simms chats with Dan about how the Darnold trade was a good move for both sides. Lastly, Alabama head coach Nick Saban called in the final hour to discuss his off season and offer a little insight on Pro Days.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
